alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Jones; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 10:56PM CDT until June 30 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR HASKELL...EASTERN JONES...NORTHWESTERN SHACKELFORD AND SOUTHWESTERN THROCKMORTON COUNTIES... At 1056 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Weinert to near Lake Stamford Marina to Nugent, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Lake Stamford Marina around 1100 PM CDT. Weinert around 1105 PM CDT. Irby around 1110 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Jud, Funston, Big Country Baptist Assembly, Us-277 Near The Haskell- Knox County Line, The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600 and Tuxedo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
